FuncDef:
The map traffic-class command sets the Traffic-class field value in public network-to-private network IPv6 packets.
The undo map traffic-class command deletes the setting.
By default, the device copies the IPv4 ToS value and pastes it to the Traffic-class field in IPv6 header.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets a priority value for reverse IPv6 packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255.

ExtraInfo: To set the Traffic-class field value in public network-to-private network IPv6 packets, run the map traffic-class command. When a device performs MAP encapsulation for packets, the device by default copies the IPv4 ToS value and pastes it to the Traffic-class field in IPv6 header.
